00020 // This files branches between the 3 implementations of sum:
00021 
00022 // constraint_fullsum.h  : Standard implementation.
00023 // constraint_lightsum.h : Only for very short arrays by not storing any state.
00024 // constraint_sum_bool.h : Only for arrays of booleans, summed to a constant.
00025 
00026 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_SUM_QPWO
00027 #define CONSTRAINT_SUM_QPWO
00028 
00029 #include "constraint_fullsum.h"
00030 #include "constraint_lightsum.h"
00031 #include "constraint_sum_bool.h"
00032 
00033 template<typename VarArray,  typename VarSum>
00034 AbstractConstraint*
00035 BuildCT_LEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const vector<VarSum>& _var_sum, ConstraintBlob&)
00036 { 
00037   if(_var_array.size() == 2)
00038   {
00039     array<typename VarArray::value_type, 2> v_array;
00040     for(int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00041       v_array[i] = _var_array[i];
00042     return LightLessEqualSumCon(stateObj, v_array, _var_sum[0]);
00043   }
00044   else
00045   {
00046     return new LessEqualSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum>(stateObj, _var_array, _var_sum[0]); 
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 inline AbstractConstraint*
00051 BuildCT_LEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<BoolVarRef>& var_array, const vector<ConstantVar>& var_sum, ConstraintBlob&)
00052 { 
00053   runtime_val t2(checked_cast<int>(var_sum[0].getAssignedValue()));
00054   return BoolLessEqualSumCon(stateObj, var_array, t2);
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<typename VarArray,  typename VarSum>
00058 AbstractConstraint*
00059 BuildCT_GEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<VarArray>& _var_array, const vector<VarSum>& _var_sum, ConstraintBlob&)
00060 { 
00061   if(_var_array.size() == 2)
00062   {
00063     array<VarArray, 2> v_array;
00064     for(int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00065       v_array[i] = _var_array[i];
00066     return LightGreaterEqualSumCon(stateObj, v_array, _var_sum[0]);
00067   }
00068   else
00069   {
00070     return (new LessEqualSumConstraint<vector<typename NegType<VarArray>::type>, 
00071       typename NegType<VarSum>::type>(stateObj, VarNegRef(_var_array), VarNegRef(_var_sum[0]))); 
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 inline AbstractConstraint*
00076 BuildCT_GEQSUM(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<BoolVarRef>& var_array, const vector<ConstantVar>& var_sum, ConstraintBlob&)
00077 { 
00078   runtime_val t2(checked_cast<int>(var_sum[0].getAssignedValue()));
00079   return BoolGreaterEqualSumCon(stateObj, var_array, t2);
00080 }
00081 
00082 #endif
